definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The chemist voided the glass bottle.
sentences.chinese: 這名化學家清空了玻璃瓶。
一個很了不起的化學家。

sentences.english: Chemists discovered how to make synthetic rubber.
sentences.chinese: 化學家發現了製造合成橡膠的方法。

sentences.english: But a chemist in Texas has another idea.
sentences.chinese: 但是德克薩斯一名化學家有另外一個想法。

sentences.english: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，你想做一個鍊金術士，還是一個化學家呢？

sentences.english: But then Nichia Chemical of Japan figured out how to produce blue LEDs.
sentences.chinese: 不久，日本化學家研製出發藍光的發光二極管。

sentences.english: Chemists use a formal language to represent the chemical structure of molecules.
sentences.chinese: 化學家也使用一種形式語言來表分子的化學結構。

sentences.english: A Bolivian chemist displays a small amount of lithium carbonate.�
sentences.chinese: 一位玻利維亞化學家正在展示提取出來的少量碳酸鋰。

sentences.english: Chemists then tinker with these to enhance their taste.
sentences.chinese: 然後化學家們會做些粗略的修補以增強它的口味。

sentences.english: So, we being chemists, 1s we'll call that 1 s instead of 1, 0.
sentences.chinese: 作爲化學家，我們把1，0，0叫做。

sentences.english: The plot of the movie involved a chemist who sublimates compounds.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影的情節涉及一位純化化合物的化學家。

sentences.english: Biochemists are doing research into the causes of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 生化學家正在作研究探討愛滋病的成因。

sentences.english: Martin Chaplin, a chemist at London South Bank University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦南岸大學的化學家得馬丁卓別林表示贊同。

sentences.english: British chemist David, was born in 1778 in Penzance.
sentences.chinese: 英國化學家戴維，1778年出生於彭贊斯。

sentences.english: A chemist can separate a medicine into its components.
sentences.chinese: 化學家能把一種藥物的各種成分分解出來。

sentences.english: The chemist Kekule discovered the ring structure of benzene in a dream.
sentences.chinese: 化學家凱庫勒在夢境中就發現了苯的環形結構。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: Berkeley (name)/George Berkeley (1685-1753), Bishop of Cloyne, famous British philosopher/Berkeley, university city in the San Francisco bay area, California
Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
